question.title: Why is CAS Ticket Sentinel unable to configure the password?
question.body:
When I use CAS v7.1.6 to store tickets in Redis Sentinel, I have already configured sentinel sentinel-related properties.

However, as long as I add cas.ticket.registry.redis.password, CAS will think that I am using the standalone version of Redis and start trying to connect to localhost:6379.

gradle:implementation 'org.apereo.cas:cas-server-support-redis-ticket-registry'
properties:cas.ticket.registry.redis.sentinel.master;cas.ticket.registry.redis.sentinel.node;cas.ticket.registry.redis.password;
